summary: An ordinance accepting a permit from the Northern Pacific Railway Company to construct, maintain and operate across the right of way of its Sumas Branch in Section 2, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W. M., and underneath the roadbed and tract of tracts thereon, an 8 inch cast iron watermain, and authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to sign said permit on behalf of the City of Seattle.
